item.title: CVE-2022-38104|2024-09-16T19:51:12.348Z -- biplob%20adhikari -- accordions%20%E2%80%93%20multiple%20accordions%20or%20faqs%20builder%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Auth. WordPress Options Change (siteurl, users_can_register, default_role, admin_email and new_admin_email) vulnerability in Biplob Adhikari's Accordions â€“ Multiple Accordions or FAQs Builder plugin (versions <= 2.0.3 on WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2022-36375|2024-09-16T17:54:10.373Z -- biplob%20adhikari -- tabs%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authenticated (high role user) WordPress Options Change vulnerability in Biplob Adhikari's Tabs plugin <= 3.6.0 at WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2024-37120|2024-08-02T03:50:55.256Z -- biplob%20adhikari -- tabs
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Biplob Adhikari Tabs allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Tabs: from n/a through 4.0.6.
